description: Attribute Increase: Choose an Attribute. The chosen Attribute increases by 1 (up to the Attribute Limit).
Human Resolve: Your Life is increased by 1.
Flexibility: You gain 1 additional Skill Point during Character Creation.
Quick Learner: You gain 1 Skill Point.
Persistent: The penalties from the Exhaustion condition are reduced by 1.
notes: Pretty strong doesn't always come up

description: Just Lucky I Guess: A number of times equal to your Combat Proficiency, you can reroll a die and take the preferred result. You regain all expended uses at the beginning of each session.
notes: Very powerful and gets more powerful as you level up
Points will be calculated from individual feats

description: Tough: Your HP max is increases by 1
Toxic Fortitude: You have Poison Resistance (Half) and ADV on Saves against being Poinsed.
notes: low bonus because of limited use

description: Iron Stomach: You have ADV on Saves against effects that come from consuming food or liquids.
notes: too niche to be consistently helpful

description: Thick-Skinned: Your AC incres by 1 while not wearing Heavy Armor.
Thick-Bearded: You are immune to airborne effects that would deal poison damage or impose the Poisoned condition.
notes: niche but does provide an immunity

description: Dense: You have ADV on any Checks or Saves to avoid being forcibly moved
notes: very useful the setting has a lot of ranged combat

description: Cave Diver: You have Darkvision up to 4 Spaces.
notes: good utility but not common in combat

description: Minor Tremorsens: You have Tremorsense up to 2 Spaces
notes: good against stealthy enemies and blinded condition
